sentences.sentence: There was just enough moonlight for him to see the bottom of his door, so he blew out his candle and unsheathed his sword. Then he stood waiting.
sentences.translation: 月光刚好能让他看清房门底下的地方，于是他吹灭了蜡烛，拔出剑来站在那等着。

sentences.sentence: By now the imperial Charlemagne might have unsheathed Joyeuse.
sentences.translation: 到如今，查理曼大帝或许该将“咎瓦尤斯”拔剑出鞘了。
